title: Elon Musk New CyberTruck
body:
So, Elon Musk revealed the CyberTruck, and... Well looks like a truck a child would draw. Did Elon Musk just punk everyone? How in the world did he think that this (Picture above) was at all attractive, or most importantly street legal? There is no way this CyberTruck meets regulations, zero mirrors, bullet proof, and a non a crumple zone that consist of you. What was he ever thinking? 

https://imgur.com/H2pwytT

What's your opinions? I mean it has good specs overall (Video provided below)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m7atGkba-Z8&t
